synopsis.text: An explosion in Tokyo, ignited by a boy with extraordinary psychic abilities, triggers World War III in 1988. Fast forward to 2019, Neo-Tokyo has risen from the ashes, but it's a city plagued by gang violence and anti-government terrorism. In this chaotic metropolis, Shoutarou Kaneda leads a biker gang known as 'the Capsules.' After a confrontation with a rival gang, Kaneda's timid friend, Tetsuo Shima, encounters a mysterious esper who has escaped from a government institution. This encounter awakens Tetsuo's latent psychic abilities, drawing the attention of the government, who seeks to control him. As Tetsuo's powers grow beyond anyone's imagination, he becomes a ticking time bomb that could once again devastate the city. With the military, the government, and his former friends all vying to control or stop him, Tetsuo must decide how to use his newfound power. Will he become the city's savior, or its destroyer? Experience the thrilling journey of power, corruption, and revenge in this iconic anime masterpiece.
